text: Alec Nigel Broers, Baron Broers, FRS FMedSci FREng (born 17 September 1938) is a British electrical engineer. In September 2008, Lord Broers took over from Sir David Cooksey as chairman of the board of directors at the Diamond Light Source, the United Kingdom's largest new scientific facility for 45 years. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:British electrical engineers
title: Alec Broers, Baron Broers
